## ObjectId.(constructor)

Create an ObjectId type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(id?: string | Uint8Array | number | ObjectIdLike | ObjectId);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string \| Uint8Array \| number \| [ObjectIdLike](./oid-lite.objectidlike.md) \| [ObjectId](./oid-lite.objectid.md) | Can be a 24 character hex string, 12 byte binary Buffer, or a number. |
